Title: RaikageVX
Description: Use Aspects to make your code better, and more more maintainable, our goal is to make apps development like a puzzle game.
HomeWiki:
Mvx Waving


use Postsharp Aspects to make your MVVM Cross code smaller, more understandable and maintainable, Mvx Waving is a set of Aspects designed for meanly for MVVM Cross Apps which will make your life easier.

1- NotifyPropertyChanged

2- MvxNavigationCommand

3- Validate Attribute (integrated with Fluent Validation)

4- Automatic Commands

 5-MessageListener

 NuGet

PM> Install-Package RaikageFramework
